subject: Quick note: Secure a 20-minute discovery call
body:
AI model training involves feeding data to a model to optimize its parameters. 
Evaluating synthetic data requires metrics to assess fidelity and diversity. 
Pearls of Wisdom, a company that generates synthetic data sets for training AI models. 
Synthetic data can inherit or amplify biases present in the original data or generation process. 
Model parameter optimization involves adjusting parameters to minimize the difference between predicted and actual outputs.

Goal: Secure a 20-minute discovery call
